page.title: 05ST.GEORGE'S CHURCH,RODINGTON
page.content: THE LADY WHO LIVES NEXT DOOR TO THE CHURCH KEEPS THE KEYS TO IT. SHE LIKES TO KEEP THE CHURCH LOCKED BECAUSE SHE IS AFRAID OF VANDALS SPOILING THE BEAUTY OF IT. ST. GEORGE'S HAS ONLY ONCE BEEN VANDALISED. SOME BOYS BROKE INTO THE CHURCH, AND MADE A MESS WITH CIGARETTE ENDS, BUT DID NOT STEAL ANYTHING. SHE IS HAPPY TO OPEN THE CHURCH TO ANY VISITORS, LIKE THE LADY WHO HAD EMIGRATED TO AUSTRALIA BUT CAME BACK TO SEE THE CHURCH SHE HAD BEEN MARRIED IN YEARS BEFORE. A NEW RECTOR CAME IN JANUARY. HE HAS THREE OTHER PARISHES BESIDES RODINGTON. HE BELIEVES THE CHURCH SHOULD BE OPEN TO EVERYONE.THE RECTOR TAKES 4 SERVICES ON SUNDAY, BUT NOT ALWAYS IN RODINGTON THE RECTOR'S FAVOURITE SERVICE IS HOLY COMMUNION. ABOUT 26 PEOPLE REGULARLY ATTEND CHURCH, BUT THERE ARE OFTEN LESS THAN 18 PEOPLE AT A SERVICE.
